local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")

local Remotes = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("Remotes", 9e9)
local RecieveCoin = Remotes:WaitForChild("RecieveCoin", 9e9)
local Jeepnies = workspace:WaitForChild("Jeepnies", 9e9)
local Jeepney = Jeepnies:WaitForChild(player.Name, 9e9)
local PassengerValues = Jeepney:WaitForChild("PassengerValues", 9e9)

task.spawn(function()
    while true do
        RecieveCoin:FireServer({
            {
                PassengerValues = PassengerValues,
                Password = 838875481,
                Main = true,
                Value = 300
            }
        })
        task.wait(0.01)
    end
end)
